info.name: MediAid API documentation
info.description:
Architecture: Model-View-Controller

Tech Stack:  
Frontend: React JS  
Backend: NodeJS and Express  
Database: MongoDB

item.name: Authorization

request.description: Gets information about the authenticated user.

item.description: The /api/auth endpoint handles login and registration for patients and doctors.

item.name: User Info
item.description: The /api/user endpoint handles fetching and updating user information.

item.name: Doctor info
Get time slots by doctor id

response.name: Success

item.description: The /api/user endpoint handles fetching and updating doctor information.

item.name: Review
Get all reviews for a doctor

item.description: The /api/review endpoint is used to fetch user reviews for doctors.

item.name: Appointment
Get all appointments for patient or doctor
Approve appointment and grant a serial number
Get all appointments for a doctor-patient combo

item.description: The /api/appointment endpoint is used to create and modify appointments.

item.name: Prescription

response.name: Success

item.description: The /api/prescription endpoint is used to create, modify and remove prescriptions related to an appointment.

item.name: Test

response.name: Success
Success

item.description: The /api/test endpoint is used to create, update, and remove descriptions of various lab tests.

item.name: Report
Get all reports for an user
Get reports for an user-doctor combo

item.description: The /api/report endpoint is used to fetch, create and modify reports for lab tests.

item.name: Medicine

response.name: Success
Success

item.description: The /api/medicine endpoint is used to store, update and access information about various drugs.

item.name: Transaction
item.description: The /api/transaction endpoint is used to create and fetch transactions.
